item.title: Driving B2B innovations with a B2C mindset.
item.description: Any business is either selling their services / goods to other businesses (B2B) or to consumers (B2C). There’s also a type of business that sells to other businesses which end-up selling to consumers (B2B2C) B2B stands for Business to business but can also be called boring to boring and that’s due to the fact of some sort of conservatism B2C is brutal as it takes no time for you (the consumer) to go from a paid solution A to a paid solution B.
